segment.source: How to Set Up Publishing Refresh on Login
segment.target: How to Set Up Publishing Refresh on Login

segment.source: How to Set Up Publishing Refresh on Login
segment.target: How to Set Up Publishing Refresh on Login

segment.source: How to Set Up Publishing Refresh on Login
segment.target: How to Set Up Publishing Refresh on Login

segment.source: You can use the following procedure to configure the Application Virtualization (App-V) Client to refresh the publishing information from the server each time you log in to the computer.
segment.target: You can use the following procedure to configure the Application Virtualization (App-V) Client to refresh the publishing information from the server each time you log in to the computer.

segment.source: After the client is configured, the refresh operation is automatic.
segment.target: After the client is configured, the refresh operation is automatic.

segment.source: To refresh the publishing information on login
segment.target: To refresh the publishing information on login

segment.source: Click Publishing Servers in the Scope pane.
segment.target: Click Publishing Servers in the Scope pane.

segment.source: In the Results pane, right-click the desired server and select Properties from the pop-up-menu.
segment.target: In the Results pane, right-click the desired server and select Properties from the pop-up-menu.

segment.source: In the Properties dialog box, on the Refresh tab, select the Refresh configuration server on user login check box.
segment.target: In the Properties dialog box, on the Refresh tab, select the Refresh configuration server on user login check box.

segment.source: Click Apply to change the configuration.
segment.target: Click Apply to change the configuration.

segment.source: When you finish configuring the settings, click OK to exit the dialog box and return to the Application Virtualization Management Console.
segment.target: When you finish configuring the settings, click OK to exit the dialog box and return to the Application Virtualization Management Console.

segment.source: The publishing information will now be refreshed each time you log in to the system.
segment.target: The publishing information will now be refreshed each time you log in to the system.

segment.source: How to Configure the Client in the Application Virtualization Client Management Console
segment.target: How to Configure the Client in the Application Virtualization Client Management Console
